Church is built upon Peter’s confession that says, “Jesus is Christ.”

God loves those who are reluctant givers.

The reason why God disciplines us is because He loves us.

God at times lets us be tempted beyond what we can bear.
God will not let us be tempted beyond what we can bear.

The three important works of pastors is to equip the members, do the works of ministry and build up the body of Christ.
God’s commands seem to restrict us but they truly give us freedom.
Even if we don’t practice God’s word, we will grow and change if we listen to God’s word a lot.
The rocky soil is someone who hears God’s word but does not bear fruit because of the worries of this life and the deceitfulness of wealth.
Someone who hears God’s word with one ear but lets it out through the other ear is compared to the hardened path.
If you have God-honoring priority, God will take care of your basic necessities.
A responsible Christian is someone who takes care of his needs first and then seeks God’s kingdom and His righteousness.
When God evaluates our work, He looks for faithfulness more than the results.
God’s compliment is proportional to the fruit of our ministry.
